data.title: George Segal
meta_keywords: Roles turned down by George Segal
data.meta_description: See which roles George Segal turned down.
data.text:
Roles turned down by George Segal:

Had the role of the married man suffering a middle-aged crisis and falling for a beautiful young woman, then the director decided on another actor.

Actor who got the part: Dudley Moore

George Segal was originally attached to project but when producers saw how much better Dudley Moore was in '10' (a part Seagal had originally been cast in) they replaced him with the same man again!.

Actor who got the part: Dudley Moore

George Segal dropped out, no reason given.

Actor who got the part: Gene Hackman

Among director Robert Altman's choices to star in his hallucinatory "anti-Western."

Actor who got the part: Warren Beatty

Did you know that George Segal was not the only choice for these movies? (click to learn more)
